metadata.name: stackable items mod v2
metadata.description:
[h1]Description[/h1] This mod is an updated version from the original stackable items mod which adds new stackable items https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3063257113 [h1]Shout-out to kdogjake in the first place for creating the mod and for letting people update it ❤️[/h1] [h2]NOW WITH MOD CONFIG MENU SUPPORT! + REPENTOGON[/h2] [h2]NOW WITH DESCRIPTIONS COMPATIBLE WITH EXTERNAL ITEM DESCRIPTIONS![/h2]
[h1]Old Items[/h1] - Cursed Eye - Car Battery - Loki's Horns (does not stack infinitely) - Giant Cell (WIP) - X-Ray Vision (does not stack infinitely) - Isaac's Tomb - Heartbreak - Card Reading (does not stack infinitely) - Guppy's Tail - Cracked Orb (does not stack infinitely) - Schoolbag (does not stack infinitely) - Infestation - Infestation 2 - Jumper Cables (does not stack infinitely) - Eye Sore - Empty Heart - 9 Volt - Bloody Lust (WIP) - Bloody Gust (WIP) - Lusty Blood (WIP) - The Stairway (does not stack infinitely) - Scapular - Gnawed Leaf - Linger Bean - Godhead - No. 2 (WIP) - Tiny Planet - Serpent's Kiss
[h1]New Items(Mod v2)[/h1] [h1]Compatible with multiple players[/h1] - Mysterious Liquid - Hungry Soul - Anemic - Pupula Duplex - Spoon Bender - Toxic Shock - Spelunker Hat (does not stack infinitely) - PHD (does not stack infinitely) - Virgo (does not stack infinitely) - Lucky Foot (does not stack infinitely) - Lump of Coal - Chocolate Milk (Currently working on Rubber Cement and a few more items, also making old items compatible with multiple players)
[h2]Check out Hutts’ video on the mod here![/h2] https://youtu.be/CShMxC-pfMA?si=-DBtW0t3D2tMEWcz
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - kdogjake - Original Mod Creator https://twitter.com/kd0gjake - Hutts - Original Mod Idea - TheTurtleMelon - Ideas & Mod Thumbnail - PixelPlz - Boss rush and Hush door code for X-Ray vision
